    • Method Detail

      • setShader

        public Layer setShader(GLShader shader)
        Description copied from interface: Layer
        Configures a custom shader for use when rendering this layer (and its children). Passing null will cause the default shader to be used. Configuring a shader on a group layer will cause that shader to be used when rendering the group layer's children, unless the child has a custom shader configured itself.
        Specified by:
        setShader in interface Layer
        Overrides:
        setShader in class AbstractLayer
        Returns:
        a reference to this layer for call chaining.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: Layer
        Destroys this layer, removing it from its parent layer. Any resources associated with this layer are freed, and it cannot be reused after being destroyed. Destroying a layer that has children will destroy them as well.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface Layer
        Overrides:
        destroy in class AbstractLayer

      • localTransform

        protected InternalTransform localTransform(InternalTransform parentTransform)

      • paint

        public abstract void paint(InternalTransform curTransform,
         int curTint,
         GLShader curShader)
